body: I like this dude's art, but nah, this one is a pass.
new saga/serie? i love shimaji work, hope it gets translated thanks for sharing.

Well, im not particularly fond of NTR, im but a boring Vanilla person at the end anyway. / But just not taking a very serious liking in a particular topic doesnt mean that im taking a dick in my ass about it right from the start at all. #NTRGang4Rever.

Loli and netorare is relatively rare, so I’m unsure if the exceptionally abrasive NTR fans will show up in this ones comments. Either way, I saw this on shimajis pixiv a couple months ago and noticed it was NTR, so I was at least not taken by surprise...just disappointed. Mind you I don’t hate NTR fans (unless their dickheads like the house dude) and I don’t think NTR should be annihilated, it’s just not my thing and I would’ve preferred this not being NTR, or at least not hard NTR. I’m pretty fine with soft NTR honestly, but hard NTR- stuff like this, where a large emphasis is put on the dude watching, suffering, and crying...I just can’t block it out enough to *use* it. Hats off to the people who can I guess, some really good artists do hard NTR, so y’all got tons of content.
